title: [Seething Crescent, Bend]
description: A single flickering crystal lights a bulging bend in the cavern wall, its light skittering over viscous pools of dark fluid dotting the ground.  The light illuminates long, fossilized bones embedded into the rock, numerous but so haphazard in their arrangement as to be useless in guessing the form of the creature from which they came.  To the west, a single spar of rust-colored rock juts precariously out over the cavern depths.
